params.lockedUntilEpoch: The epoch until which this tip stream is locked
params.recipient: The address of the tip stream recipient

params.recipient: The address of the tip stream recipient to remove

params.newAllocation: The new percentage allocation for the tip stream
params.newLockedUntilEpoch: The new epoch until which this tip stream is locked

getAllTipStreams().notice: Retrieves information about all tip streams

getTipStream(address).notice: Retrieves information about a specific tip stream

shake(address).notice: Distributes accumulated tips from a single FleetCommander
